item.title: [scd] Dictate of the Twin Gods
item.description:
Enchantment

Flash

If a source would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals double that damage to that permanent or player instead.

item.title: [scd] Dictate of Heliod
item.description:
Enchantment

Flash

Creatures you control get +2/+2.

item.title: [scd] Devouring Light
item.description:
Instant

Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)

Exile target attacking or blocking creature.

item.title: [scd] Demanding Dragon
item.description:
Creature — Dragon

Flying

When Demanding Dragon enters the battlefield, it deals 5 damage to target opponent unless that player sacrifices a creature.

item.title: [scd] Deep Analysis
item.description:
Sorcery

Target player draws two cards.

Flashback—{1}{U}, Pay 3 life. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

item.title: [scd] Deadly Tempest
item.description:
Sorcery

Destroy all creatures. Each player loses life equal to the number of creatures they controlled that were destroyed this way.

item.title: [scd] Dawn of Hope
item.description:
Enchantment

Whenever you gain life, you may pay {2}. If you do, draw a card.

{3}{W}: Create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token with lifelink.

item.title: [scd] Dauntless Escort
item.description:
Creature — Rhino Soldier

Sacrifice Dauntless Escort: Creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn.

item.title: [scd] Curse of Disturbance
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura Curse

Enchant player

Whenever enchanted player is attacked, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token. Each opponent attacking that player does the same.

item.title: [scd] Curse of Bounty
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura Curse

Enchant player

Whenever enchanted player is attacked, untap all nonland permanents you control. Each opponent attacking that player untaps all nonland permanents they control.

item.title: [scd] Cultivate
item.description:
Sorcery

Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand, then shuffle.

item.title: [scd] Crush Contraband
item.description:
Instant

Choose one or both —

• Exile target artifact.

• Exile target enchantment.

item.title: [scd] Cruel Revival
item.description:
Instant

Destroy target non-Zombie creature. It can't be regenerated. Return up to one target Zombie card from your graveyard to your hand.

item.title: [scd] Crucible of Fire
item.description:
Enchantment

Dragon creatures you control get +3/+3.

item.title: [scd] Crippling Fear
item.description:
Sorcery

Choose a creature type. Creatures that aren't of the chosen type get -3/-3 until end of turn.

item.title: [scd] Coveted Jewel
item.description:
Artifact

When Coveted Jewel enters the battlefield, draw three cards.

{T}: Add three mana of any one color.

Whenever one or more creatures an opponent controls attack you and aren't blocked, that player draws three cards and gains control of Coveted Jewel. Untap it.

item.title: [scd] Counterspell
item.description:
Instant

Counter target spell.

item.title: [scd] Condemn
item.description:
Instant

Put target attacking creature on the bottom of its owner's library. Its controller gains life equal to its toughness.

item.title: [scd] Conclave Tribunal
item.description:
Enchantment

Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)

When Conclave Tribunal enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Conclave Tribunal leaves the battlefield.

item.title: [scd] Command Tower
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

item.title: [scd] Commander's Sphere
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

Sacrifice Commander's Sphere: Draw a card.

item.title: [scd] Commander's Insignia
item.description:
Enchantment

Creatures you control get +1/+1 for each time you've cast your commander from the command zone this game.

item.title: [scd] Combustible Gearhulk
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Construct

First strike

When Combustible Gearhulk enters the battlefield, target opponent may have you draw three cards. If the player doesn't, you mill three cards, then Combustible Gearhulk deals damage to that player equal to the total mana value of those cards.

item.title: [scd] Collective Unconscious
item.description:
Sorcery

Draw a card for each creature you control.

item.title: [scd] Collective Blessing
item.description:
Enchantment

Creatures you control get +3/+3.

item.title: [scd] Coastal Tower
item.description:
Land

Coastal Tower enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {W} or {U}.

item.title: [scd] Cloudblazer
item.description:
Creature — Human Scout

Flying

When Cloudblazer enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life and draw two cards.

item.title: [scd] Cleansing Nova
item.description:
Sorcery

Choose one —

• Destroy all creatures.

• Destroy all artifacts and enchantments.

item.title: [scd] Clan Defiance
item.description:
Sorcery

Choose one or more —

• Clan Defiance deals X damage to target creature with flying.

• Clan Defiance deals X damage to target creature without flying.

• Clan Defiance deals X damage to target player or planeswalker.

item.title: [scd] Citywide Bust
item.description:
Sorcery

Destroy all creatures with toughness 4 or greater.

item.title: [scd] Citanul Hierophants
item.description:
Creature — Human Druid

Creatures you control have "{T}: Add {G}."

item.title: [scd] Cinder Glade
item.description:
Land — Mountain Forest

({T}: Add {R} or {G}.)

Cinder Glade enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or more basic lands.

item.title: [scd] Cinder Barrens
item.description:
Land

Cinder Barrens enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {B} or {R}.

item.title: [scd] Choked Estuary
item.description:
Land

As Choked Estuary enters the battlefield, you may reveal an Island or Swamp card from your hand. If you don't, Choked Estuary enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {U} or {B}.

item.title: [scd] Chaos Warp
item.description:
Instant

The owner of target permanent shuffles it into their library, then reveals the top card of their library. If it's a permanent card, they put it onto the battlefield.

item.title: [scd] Champion of the Perished
item.description:
Creature — Zombie

Whenever another Zombie enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Champion of the Perished.

item.title: [scd] Champion of Lambholt
item.description:
Creature — Human Warrior

Creatures with power less than Champion of Lambholt's power can't block creatures you control.

Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Champion of Lambholt.

item.title: [scd] Chain Reaction
item.description:
Sorcery

Chain Reaction deals X damage to each creature, where X is the number of creatures on the battlefield.

item.title: [scd] Cemetery Reaper
item.description:
Creature — Zombie

Other Zombie creatures you control get +1/+1.

{2}{B}, {T}: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

item.title: [scd] Cartographer's Hawk
item.description:
Creature — Bird

Flying

When Cartographer's Hawk deals combat damage to a player who controls more lands than you, return it to its owner's hand. If you do, you may search your library for a Plains card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

item.title: [scd] Canopy Vista
item.description:
Land — Forest Plains

({T}: Add {G} or {W}.)

Canopy Vista enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or more basic lands.

item.title: [scd] Camaraderie
item.description:
Sorcery

You gain X life and draw X cards, where X is the number of creatures you control. Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

item.title: [scd] Burnished Hart
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Elk

{3}, Sacrifice Burnished Hart: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

item.title: [scd] Breath of Malfegor
item.description:
Instant

Breath of Malfegor deals 5 damage to each opponent.

item.title: [scd] Brash Taunter
item.description:
Creature — Goblin

Indestructible

Whenever Brash Taunter is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to target opponent.

{2}{R}, {T}: Brash Taunter fights another target creature.

item.title: [scd] Blossoming Sands
item.description:
Land

Blossoming Sands enters the battlefield tapped.

When Blossoming Sands enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.

{T}: Add {G} or {W}.

item.title: [scd] Blossoming Defense
item.description:
Instant

Target creature you control gets +2/+2 and gains hexproof until end of turn.

item.title: [scd] Bloodgift Demon
item.description:
Creature — Demon

Flying

At the beginning of your upkeep, target player draws a card and loses 1 life.

item.title: [scd] Bloodfell Caves
item.description:
Land

Bloodfell Caves enters the battlefield tapped.

When Bloodfell Caves enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.

{T}: Add {B} or {R}.

item.title: [scd] Blasphemous Act
item.description:
Sorcery

This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature on the battlefield.

Blasphemous Act deals 13 damage to each creature.
